text: VALUE = Log2 value of MAS5.0 signal intensity divided by median value of all non-control probe sets

protocol.text: Seedlings were grown in half-strength MS agar medium with 2% sucrose in continuous light at 22 Celsius degrees.
Total RNA was extracted using the Plant RNeasy kit (QIAGEN) following the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 micro g of total RNA.
Following fragmentation, 15 micro g of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hrs at 45 Celsius degrees on the GeneChip. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000.

The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. All signals were divided by the median value of all probe sets.
